data.actual_result: Group DM modal doesn't display your friends until re-opened
data.expected_result: Group DM modal displays your friends to add into a group DM
data.short_description: Group DM key shortcut used inside of a server won't display your friends in the modal (new Group DM modal only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have friends added - Go into a server and use the Group DM Creation key shortcut (ctrl+shift+t)
